document_data.caption: Cybriana uses ''bloom'' from within a ''forcecage''.
document_data.name: Bloom
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bloom''''' was a minor arcane [[spell]] that allowed a [[magic-user]] to conjure flowers in bloom.{{Cite comic/The Gathering|9}}{{Cite comic/Sorcerer's Moon|12-13}}
document_data.Effect: The ''bloom'' spell simply conjured a cut flower, typically a rose, in full bloom and floating in the air where directed.
document_data.Practitioners: It was a special spell known to [[elves]] of [[Shadowdale]]. It was considered a simple and harmless spell.
